questions.answer: This programming disaster occurs when a single semicolon error causes every computer program worldwide to crash simultaneously
questions.question: What is the great semicolon catastrophe?

questions.answer: In this coding nightmare, all programming languages suddenly require perfect syntax or refuse to compile any code at all
questions.question: What is syntax enforcement apocalypse?

questions.answer: This algorithmic disaster unfolds when all sorting algorithms worldwide begin running in reverse, making data increasingly disorganized
questions.question: What is reverse sorting pandemic?

questions.answer: In this version control catastrophe, git suddenly loses all commit history worldwide, leaving only the current state of all codebases
questions.question: What is commit history erasure?

questions.answer: This ultimate programming failure happens when all code comments worldwide become binding instructions that override the actual code
questions.question: What is comment supremacy rebellion?
